name: test_lifecycle_after_relations
description:
arrange: build and deploy the charm.
    act: relate to a db and a matrix homeserver.
    assert: that the charm ends up in active state.
descriptionHtml:
arrange: build and deploy the charm.
act: relate to a db and a matrix homeserver.
assert: that the charm ends up in active state.
